role.argrole: enhanced by how much, EXT or MNR

example.parse: (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تعززت) (NP-SBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM المشاعر))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS صدر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-TMP (PREP حتى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الآن))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN مؤشرات) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN احصائية))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الولايات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتحدة))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: Published until now statistical indicators in the United States

example.arg: بما صدر حتى الآن من مؤشرات احصائية في الولايات المتحدة
